chapter.text: tara eke an'yera kache ki bisaye jijnasabada karache
mahasambadatira bisaye
ye bisaye tara matanaikya karache
kakhano na [1], tara acire'i janate parabe
tarapara bali kakhano na, tara acire'i janate parabe
Amara ki karini yaminake sayya
ara parbatasamuhake pereka
ara amara srsti karechi tomaderake joraya joraya
ara tomadera ghumake karechi bisraama
ara karechi ratake abarana
ara karechi dinake jibika aharanera samaya
ara amara nirmana karechi tomadera upare sudrrha sata akasa
ara amara srsti karechi projjbala dipa
Ara amara barsana karechi meghamala hate pracura bari
yate ta dbara amara utpanna kari sasya, udbhida
o ghana sannibista udyana
Niscaya nirdharita ache bicara dina
sedina singaya phumka deya habe takhana tomara dale dale asabe
ara akasa unmukta kara habe, phale ta habe bahu dbarabisista
Ara calamana kara habe parbatasamuhake, phale segulo haye yabe maricika
niscaya jahannama ot pete apeksamana
simalanghanakaridera jan'ya pratyabartanasthala
Sekhane tara yuga yuga dhare abasthana karabe
Sekhane tara asbadana karabe na sitalata, na kono paniya
phutanta pani o pumja chara
Eta'i upayukta pratiphala
Niscaya tara kakhano hisebera asa karata na
ara tara amadera nidarsanabalite kathorabhabe mithyaropa karechila
Ara sabakichu'i amara sanraksana karechi likhitabhabe
Atahpara tomara asbada grahana kara, amara to tomadera sasti'i sudhu brd'dhi karaba
Niscaya muttakidera jan'ya ache saphalya
udyanasamuha, angurasamuha
ara samabayaska [1] udbhinna yaubana taruni
ebam paripurna panipatra
Sekhane tara sunabe na kono asara o mithya bakya
apanara rabera paksa theke puraskara, yathocita danasbarupa
yini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, dayamaya; tamra kache abedana-nibedanera sakti tadera thakabe na
Sedina ruh o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe damrabe [1]; sedina ke'u katha balabe na, tabe ‘rahamana’ yake anumati debena se chara ebam se sathika katha balabe
E dinati satya; ata'eba, yara icche se tara rabera nikata asraya grahana karuka
Niscaya amara tomaderake asanna sasti samparke satarka karalama; yedina manusa tara krtakarma dekhate pabe ebam kaphira balabe, ‘haya! Ami yadi mati hatama [1]!’
